trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property of a column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged> é gerado quando o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> propriedade de uma coluna em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controlar alterações.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso desse tipo.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível em [como: manipular colunas no controle DataGridView de formulários do Windows](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: The column with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property that changed.
trans-unit.target: A coluna com a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> que foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The previous <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> value of the column's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> anterior da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property that changed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coluna com a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> que foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property that changed.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> com o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> propriedade alterada.

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir ilustra o uso dessa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior disponível em [como: manipular colunas no controle DataGridView de formulários do Windows](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property of the column.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor anterior da propriedade <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> da coluna.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> value representing the previous value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs.Column" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> valor que representa o valor anterior do <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> propriedade o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs.Column" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar relatórios sobre vários eventos ou eventos que ocorrem com frequência, considere substituir <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> com <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> ou anexar a mensagem como um multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> chamado `DataGridView1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.
